product.title: InfinitiPro by Conair 1" Tourmaline Ceramic Flat Iron, Model CS710
product.description: Create gorgeous smooth, shiny straight hair with the InfinitiPro tourmaline ceramic 1" Flat Iron. This flat iron makes it easy to get salon straight hair at home. The tourmaline ceramic coated plates provide even heat to minimize damage for less frizz and shiny, healthy-looking hair. With 15-second heat-up to an ultra-high 455 degrees F (230 degrees C) and variable heat settings, this professional-quality hair straightener lets you style quickly and efficiently. No more waiting around for your hair straightener or flat iron to heat up! It reaches high enough heat to turn even the most out-of-control hair into shiny, smooth, and soft tresses. Extra-long floating plates make it easy to style quickly and you can even use it to create wavy curls with a flick of your wrist. Tourmaline ceramic technology provides both anti-frizz and anti-static results with less damage than other traditional straightening irons. This deep purple tourmaline ceramic flat iron emits negative ions to give you less frizz and create shiny, healthy-looking hair. You don’t have to worry that you have left your flat iron on. This model features a convenient auto-shutoff to turn the straightener off when left on too long. It also includes a bonus of 25 fl. oz. bottle of One 'N Only Argan oil to nourish and protect your beautiful and treasured hair from dryness and breakage. For a high-performance flat iron with professional capabilities, this InfinitiPro by Conair 1-inch tourmaline ceramic flat iron is the right tool for you.

product.description_full:
Create gorgeous smooth, shiny straight hair with the InfinitiPro tourmaline ceramic 1" Flat Iron. This flat iron makes it easy to get salon straight hair at home. The tourmaline ceramic coated plates provide even heat to minimize damage for less frizz and shiny, healthy-looking hair. With 15-second heat-up to an ultra-high 455 degrees F (230 degrees C) and variable heat settings, this professional-quality hair straightener lets you style quickly and efficiently. No more waiting around for your hair straightener or flat iron to heat up! It reaches high enough heat to turn even the most out-of-control hair into shiny, smooth, and soft tresses. Extra-long floating plates make it easy to style quickly and you can even use it to create wavy curls with a flick of your wrist. Tourmaline ceramic technology provides both anti-frizz and anti-static results with less damage than other traditional straightening irons. This deep purple tourmaline ceramic flat iron emits negative ions to give you less frizz and create shiny, healthy-looking hair. You don’t have to worry that you have left your flat iron on. This model features a convenient auto-shutoff to turn the straightener off when left on too long. It also includes a bonus of 25 fl. oz. bottle of One 'N Only Argan oil to nourish and protect your beautiful and treasured hair from dryness and breakage. For a high-performance flat iron with professional capabilities, this InfinitiPro by Conair 1-inch tourmaline ceramic flat iron is the right tool for you. * Tourmaline ceramic technology provides anti-frizz/anti-static/less damage
 * 455 degrees F highest ceramic heat
 * True ceramic heater 15-second heat-up
 * 3x smoother surface for faster glide
 * High shine and smoothness
 * Auto-off
 * 30 heat settings
 * Floating plate
 * ETL US listed
 * 1-inch floating plate for superior results
 * Get 70 percent less frizz and 5 times stronger hair with less breakage
 * Straighten or flip
product.description_full_html:
Create gorgeous smooth, shiny straight hair with the InfinitiPro tourmaline ceramic 1" Flat Iron. This flat iron makes it easy to get salon straight hair at home. The tourmaline ceramic coated plates provide even heat to minimize damage for less frizz and shiny, healthy-looking hair. With 15-second heat-up to an ultra-high 455 degrees F (230 degrees C) and variable heat settings, this professional-quality hair straightener lets you style quickly and efficiently. No more waiting around for your hair straightener or flat iron to heat up! It reaches high enough heat to turn even the most out-of-control hair into shiny, smooth, and soft tresses. Extra-long floating plates make it easy to style quickly and you can even use it to create wavy curls with a flick of your wrist. Tourmaline ceramic technology provides both anti-frizz and anti-static results with less damage than other traditional straightening irons. This deep purple tourmaline ceramic flat iron emits negative ions to give you less frizz and create shiny, healthy-looking hair. You don’t have to worry that you have left your flat iron on. This model features a convenient auto-shutoff to turn the straightener off when left on too long. It also includes a bonus of 25 fl. oz. bottle of One 'N Only Argan oil to nourish and protect your beautiful and treasured hair from dryness and breakage. For a high-performance flat iron with professional capabilities, this InfinitiPro by Conair 1-inch tourmaline ceramic flat iron is the right tool for you.

  • Tourmaline ceramic technology provides anti-frizz/anti-static/less damage
  • 455 degrees F highest ceramic heat
  • True ceramic heater 15-second heat-up
  • 3x smoother surface for faster glide
  • High shine and smoothness
  • Auto-off
  • 30 heat settings
  • Floating plate
  • ETL US listed
  • 1-inch floating plate for superior results
  • Get 70 percent less frizz and 5 times stronger hair with less breakage
  • Straighten or flip

specifications.name: Features
specifications.value: Long-lasting humidity protection, 455°F ultra-high ceramic heat, True ceramic heater for instant heat-up and recovery, 15-second heat-up, Get 70 percent less frizz* and 5 times stronger hair** with less breakage

product.ingredients: (INC): Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Yellow 11 (CI 47000), Red 17 (CI 26100).

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
